business.headline: Paytm nears full profitability; revenue grows to Rs 1,911 crorePaytm's revenue increased by 5% quarter-on-quarter, reaching Rs 1,911 crore, reflecting the company's steady performance and continued momentum in its core businesses.

Need a personal loan? Unlock Rs 5 lakh instantly using just your PAN cardTo apply online, you simply visit the bank or lender's website and fill out the application form. You'll need to provide your name, date of birth, mobile number, and PAN number.

Sensex ends 156 points lower, Nifty below 24,400; Adani Enterprises falls 4%The BSE Sensex ended 155.77 points lower at 80,641.07, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 81.55 points to settle at 24,379.60. Most of the broader market indices also declined during the trading session due to high selling pressure.

Yes Bank denies reports of stake sale to Japan's SMBC, calls it 'speculative'The private sector lender clarified that while it regularly explores business opportunities, there is nothing material to disclose under current regulatory norms.

Saying yes to a joint loan? Here's how it can affect your credit scoreEvery time an EMI is paid on time, it reflects positively on both borrowers' credit profiles. Over time, this builds your credit score. If you were added as a co-applicant to help someone get a loan because your own score was low, this is your chance to improve it.

ITR filing 2025: 5 common mistakes you must avoid while filing your tax returnsUsing the wrong ITR form can delay your tax processing or, worse, your return may get rejected. Also, filing your ITR is not the final step, you must also verify it.

Is the worst over for global economy as Trump eases stance on tariffs?Even as Trump suggests deals are near with countries like India, Japan, and South Korea, and China reviews a fresh proposal from Washington, the global economy isn't breathing easy yet.

Opted for new tax regime? Here's a look at key benefits, what you can claimThe government brought in the new tax regime to make things simpler for taxpayers. It gives you more tax slabs with lower rates, which means you may end up paying less tax.

Ather Energy gives up listing gains, slides 4% after weak debut. Hold or sell?Ather Energy's stock opened at Rs 328 on the NSE, up 2.2% over its issue price of Rs 321, but slipped over 4% to an intraday low of Rs 308.95 amid weak market sentiment.

Sensex down over 200 points. Why is the stock market down today?As of 10:48 am, the BSE Sensex was down 213.43 points at 80,583.41, while the NSE Nifty50 slipped 72.40 points to 24,388.75. Broader indices saw sharper cuts, with the Nifty midcap and smallcap indices falling around 1% each, reflecting risk-off sentiment in domestic-focused sectors.

Ather Energy makes muted debut on Dalal Street, lists 2% above IPO priceAt the time of listing, the Bengaluru-based company was valued at around Rs 12,144 crore, slightly below its implied market capitalisation of Rs 12,300 crore at the upper end of the IPO price band (Rs 304–Rs 321).

Explained: Why Yes Bank shares are rising todayYes Bank shares rose sharply as shareholders reacted positively to the news. At around 9:43 am, shares of the bank were trading 5.30% higher at Rs 18.69.

Sensex down over 80 points, Nifty above 24,400; pharma stocks tumbleThe BSE Sensex was down 28.27 points to trade at 80,768.57 around 9:24 am, while the NSE Nifty50 was down 10.85 points to 24,450.30.

Wall Street slips, snapping 9-day rally as oil prices hit 4-year lowWall Street's nine-day winning streak ended Monday as oil prices fell to a four-year low following an OPEC+ output boost. Tech stocks and Buffett's exit also weighed on markets.

ITR filing 2025: Forms 1 to 5 notified, which one should you use?ITR-1, or Sahaj, is for resident individuals whose total income is not more than Rs 50 lakh. If your income is from a salary or pension, one house property, bank deposit interest, or agricultural income not more than Rs 5,000, then this form is suitable for you.

Samsung challenges $520 million tax notice in India: ReportThe case revolves around how the company imported telecom equipment between 2018 and 2021. According to tax officials, Samsung mislabelled these imports to pay lower customs duties of 10–20%, which has now triggered a hefty penalty.

'Making broke adults': Redditor's viral post shreds MBA salary dreamsA viral Reddit post lists some real offers seen on LinkedIn and compares the shiny package (CTC or cost-to-company) with the actual in-hand salary after taxes and deductions.

Job change and no EPF transfer? You might be losing 8.25% interest earningsWhen you switch jobs, your Universal Account Number (UAN) stays the same, but your EPF account with your old employer doesn't automatically move to the new one. You have to transfer it yourself through the EPFO Member Sewa portal.

Escalation in tensions with India would weigh on Pakistan's growth: Moody'sGlobal rating agency Moody's said on Monday that a sustained escalation in tensions with India would likely weigh on Pakistan's growth.

Sensex ends 294 points higher, Nifty above 24,460; Adani Enterprises jumps 7%The BSE Sensex climbed 294.85 points, or 0.37%, to close at 80,796.84, while the NSE Nifty50 advanced 114.45 points, or 0.47%, to settle at 24,461.15.

Finance Minister discusses economic issues with ADB chief, no mention of PakNirmala Sitharaman met ADB President Masato Kanda at the ADB annual meeting in Manila and also held discussions with the Finance Minister of Italy, Giancarlo Giorgetti.

ITR filing 2025: Key tax benefits under Section 80C, 80D, and 24BIn case you are opting for the old tax regime, under Section 80C you can claim up to Rs 1.5 lakh of deductions every year. This section covers several popular options, like Public Provident Fund (PPF), Employees' Provident Fund (EPF), ELSS mutual fund, 5-year fixed deposits and premiums for life insurance, etc.
Explained: Why Swiggy share price jumped 6% todaySwiggy's stock may have surged nearly 6% today, but it's still down 40% year-to-date.

'To save crores in taxes': Investment banker on why rich are buying farmhousesIn India, any income from farming is completely tax-free. That means if someone says they earned money by selling vegetables, fruits, or milk from their farmland, they don't have to pay income tax on it.

Ather Energy IPO to list tomorrow. Check allotment status, latest GMPAther Energy's IPO, which ran from April 28 to April 30, involved a mix of fresh equity worth Rs 2,626 crore and an offer for sale (OFS) of 1.1 crore shares.

Adani Ports shares jump 7% after Q4 results. Check target price, other detailsAdani Ports stock climbed to Rs 1,355 from its previous close of Rs 1,267.05, up 6.90% on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). The upmove came after the company reported robust March quarter earnings and posted healthy operational growth in April, prompting several brokerages to raise their target prices.

Sensex rises over 500 points. 3 reasons why stock market is risingForeign investor inflows, strong macro data, and improving global cues have fired up the bulls. While geopolitical risks linger, analysts say the rally could hold as long as key support levels stay intact.

Kotak Mahindra Bank tumbles over 5% after Q4 miss. Buy, hold or sell?Kotak Mahindra Bank shares fell over 5% in early trade on Monday as investors reacted negatively to the lender's Q4 financial results. Despite some positives in asset quality, softer loan growth and pressure on core income metrics weighed on investor sentiment, especially after the recent rally in the stock.

SBI share price dips nearly 2% after Q4 profit miss. Buy, hold or sell?SBI's share price was down 1.54% to Rs 787.75 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) at 10:04 am. Earlier in the trading session, the stock declined to Rs 783 on the BSE, marking its sixth consecutive session in the red.
Sensex jumps over 350 points, Nifty above 24,400; Adani Ports gains nearly 3%The BSE Sensex rose 341 points to 80,843, while the Nifty50 advanced 84 points to 24,421 around 9:21 am.

Stock market opening: Sensex, Nifty likely to gain amid easing trade tensionsStock market opening today: Markets look set to kick off the week on a bullish note, as easing global tensions, robust foreign inflows, and Wall Street gains provide the perfect cocktail for investor optimism.

Stocks to watch today: Adani Ports, SBI, Kotak Bank, Tata Motors and moreMarkets may open strong as global cues turn favourable and earnings momentum continues. Key stocks across banking, auto, infra, and FMCG could dominate investor attention this Monday.

Adani aides lobby Trump officials to drop $265 million bribery case: ReportAdani's representatives are trying to make the case that his prosecution does not align with Trump's priorities and should be reconsidered, Bloomberg News reported.

Explained: Why Warren Buffett warned that US Dollar could be 'going to hell'The remarks reflected deeper concerns Buffett has long harboured: America's swelling deficit, a growing culture of bureaucratic inefficiency, and the rising use of trade policy as a political weapon.

Who is Greg Abel, Warren Buffett's heir to Berkshire's $1.18 trillion empire?Greg Abel, who has served as vice chairman overseeing Berkshire's sprawling non-insurance operations, has been a trusted Warren Buffett lieutenant for over a decade.

Warren Buffett bows out with stark dollar warning: Currency going to hellWarren Buffett, who officially handed over the CEO reins to Vice Chairman Greg Abel at the meeting, indicated that a significant investment in a European country could prompt Berkshire to conduct more financing in foreign currencies.

Warren Buffett to step down as Berkshire CEO, Greg Abel to take overWarren Buffett, 94, said that he will step down as CEO of Berkshire Hathaway at the end of 2025 and hand over the reins to Vice Chairman Greg Abel.

India bans all imports from Pakistan in response to Pahalgam terror attackIn a strong response to the Pahalgam terror attack, India has banned both direct and indirect imports from Pakistan and denied Pakistani ships access to Indian ports. Although direct imports were minimal, some goods were entering through third-party countries.

India bans imports from Pak, bars port access in tough moves post PahalgamThe move comes after India announced the closure of the Attari-Wagah land border following the Pahalgam attack, crippling bilateral trade.
Mutual funds are on the rise again. Check out these 5 bets in 2025Choosing the right mutual fund depends on how much risk you're comfortable with and how long you plan to invest.

entertainment.headline: Tony Kakkar, Shaan extend support to Sonu Nigam after Bengaluru concert rowSinger Tony Kakkar and Shaan defended Sonu Nigam after he received backlash, and a police complaint, over his remarks at a Bengaluru concert.

Neha Kakkar reacts to Melbourne concert controversy days after organiser's claimNeha Kakkar has responded to allegations that she skipped her Melbourne concert due to low turnout, sharing a video of a lively performance to counter the claims. The controversy continues as event organisers alleged she refused to perform because of the crowd size.

Karthik Subbaraj on his next after Retro: Want to make an indie filmAfter directing high-budget films like 'Retro,' director Karthik Subbaraj has revealed his plans to direct an indie film, a low-budget project featuring new artists.

Bling denied: Why Diljit Dosanjh didn't wear Rs 21,000 crore necklace to Met GalaDiljit Dosanjh made a powerful Met Gala debut in a regal Prabal Gurung outfit inspired by the Maharaja of Patiala. His team's attempt to borrow the Maharaja's iconic Rs 21,000 crore Cartier necklace was denied, leading them to commission custom jewellery instead.

Trump's 100% tariff on foreign films, and what it means for Indian CinemaWill the Indian film industry be impacted by Donald Trump's policy involving a 100 per cent tariff on foreign films in the US? We spoke to the industry experts to understand the US President's decision, and the respective action to be taken.

When Life Gives You Tangerines sweep Baeksang Awards, but Park Bo-gum, IU loseSouth Korea's prestigious event, the Baeksang Arts Awards, was held on May 5. While 'When Life Gives You Tangerines' secured awards across several categories, its lead actors Park Bo-gum and IU missed out on individual accolades.

Vinay Pathak accused of plagiarising Kolkata director's work in Gram ChikitsalayPrime Video's 'Gram Chikitsalay' faces plagiarism allegations before its release. The TVF series, featuring Vinay Pathak and Amol Parashar, is set to premiere on May 9.

Singer Rahul Vaidya slams Virat Kohli fans after getting blocked by cricketerVirat Kohli's accidental like on Avneet Kaur's Instagram post sparked online buzz, leading him to issue a clarification. Singer Rahul Vaidya mocked the explanation, joking about Instagram glitches and revealing he was blocked by Kohli.

Summer 2025 and South cinema: A season of surprises or a wasted opportunity?With some surprise hits and notable missteps, the summer of 2025 raises a crucial point. Southern cinema has either capitalised on its potential or missed a golden opportunity to redefine the season's power.

Karan Johar is all praise for Indian celebs at Met Gala 2025, except for PriyankaFilmmaker Karan Johar reviewed the Met Gala 2025 looks of Indian celebrities. He mentioned everyone from Shah Rukh Khan to Diljit Dosanjh and Kiara Advani, but Priyanka Chopra wasn't to be found on his list.

Rajinikanth watches Suriya's Retro, director Karthik Subbaraj is overwhelmedSuperstar Rajinikanth recently watched Suriya's 'Retro' and appreciated director Karthik Subbaraj. The filmmaker expressed his happiness with a special note on X.

Pawandeep Rajan suffered multiple fractures, in ICU and recovering: Singer's teamIndian Idol 12 winner Pawandeep Rajan met with a major accident on May 5 and is currently undergoing treatment in Noida. His team has provided an update on his health, assuring fans that he is doing fine now and is under observation in the ICU.

Main hoon Punjab: Diljit wraps Met Gala with 'turban, culture, mother tongue' For Diljit Dosanjh, heritage and culture came first and fashion later as he walked the blue carpet at the Met Gala 2025. The 41-year-old took a bit of Punjab's royal history in his Maharaja-inspired look at the fashion's biggest night.

Telugu actors Varun Tej, Lavanya Tripathi announce pregnancyTelugu actors Varun Tej and Lavanya Tripathi announced that they are expecting their first child. They shared the announcement on their social media pages.

Shakira shares car with Diljit Dosanjh, says 'Hi, India' in viral Met Gala clipDiljit Dosanjh reunited with Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas at the Met Gala. The singer even shared a car with Shakira while making his way to the prestigious event.

Sidharth Malhotra wins hearts as he supports mother-to-be Kiara at Met Gala 2025Sidharth Malhotra's support for pregnant wife Kiara Advani at Met Gala 2025 touched hearts, even without a red carpet appearance. A viral video and his heartfelt tribute online made their quiet moment the real showstopper.

Squid Game 3 teaser: No dialogue, just dread as final game resumesNetflix's teaser for 'Squid Game' Season 3 hints at a darker, more dramatic finale as Seong Gi-hun awakens in a coffin, sparking theories about new game dynamics and unseen threats.

SRK introduces himself at Met Gala, fans say foreign media failed to recognise himShah Rukh Khan's Met Gala debut was nothing short of iconic. In one of the viral moments from the blue carpet, the actor was seen introducing himself to the foreign media and fans thought the media failed to recognise him.

I'm a memory from home: SRK on owning Met Gala 2025 with diamonds, legacy and graceShah Rukh Khan represented India at MET Gala 2025 in a black Sabyasachi suit teamed up with tons of diamonds. He later spoke to the media and, quite graciously, called himself a 'memory from home'.

general news.headline: Air Force plans large-scale drill along border with Pak: Geo-intel expertIntelligence expert Damien Symon said that a Notice to Airmen, which indicates restricted airspace usage in the region, has been issued by the government for air exercise along its border with Pakistan.

7 Pak soldiers killed in blast targeting Army vehicle in Balochistan: ReportAn IED blast targeting a Pakistan Army vehicle killed seven people in the restive southern province of Balochistan. No group has claimed responsibility for the attack yet.

India and UK clinch trade pact, PM Modi says move to deepen bilateral tiesIndia and the UK signed a landmark free trade agreement in the shadow of US President Donald Trump's tariff warnings. Calling the deal a "historic milestone", PM Narendra Modi said the move will further deepen the comprehensive strategic partnership.

What will tomorrow's civil defence drills look like? Preps give a glimpseCivic volunteers conducted rehearsals ahead of tomorrow's security drills across various cities in India. The mock drills are being conducted at Centre's order amid rising tensions with Pakistan.
India at the Met Gala 2025: The hits (and the misses)With a strong lineup of Indian celebrities in attendance, Met Gala 2025 gave us some memorable fashion moments.

India's Gaganyaan Mission in final phase, maiden crew launch in 2027The next steps include a second Test Vehicle mission (TV-D2) later in 2025 and two uncrewed orbital flights in 2026, one of which will carry the Vyommitra half-humanoid robot to test critical systems before astronauts are sent into orbit.

PM got intel report, dropped J&K visit 3 days...: Mallikarjun Kharge's big chargeCongress chief Mallikarjun Kharge claimed that PM Narendra Modi cancelled his own visit to Kashmir after receiving an intel report on a possible attack in Jammu and Kashmir three days before the Pahalgam terror attack happened.
Shloka Mehta's sister Diya Mehta Jatia in edgy, backless suit at Met Gala 2025Shloka Mehta's sister Diya Mehta Jatia attended the Met Gala 2025 in an edgy backless suit from the label Bloni.

Amazon India's Great Summer Sale 2025 is here: Transform your garden with upto 60% off on lawn & garden essentialsMake your Garden and Lawn summer ready with Amazon India's Great Summer Sale 2025 that is live now. Enjoy Up to 60% off on Lawn & Garden Essentials such as Plants, Solar Lights and more.

Chenab's water flow in Pakistan hits record low as India shuts 2 dams, shows dataWater levels in Pakistan's Chenab River have dropped to a record low after India closed the sluice gates of the Salal and Baglihar dams for refilling, potentially threatening Pakistan's agricultural supply.

Indian-Americans 2nd-largest Asian group in US, now a 5.2-million communityThe Indian community in the US, which was just 1.8 million in 2000, has grown to over 5.2 million today, according to a report by the Pew Research Centre. As a result of decades of migration of skilled professionals and students to the US, the report noted Indians are the best at English proficiency among other Asian communities.

Trump's 100% tariff on foreign films, and what it means for Indian CinemaWill the Indian film industry be impacted by Donald Trump's policy involving a 100 per cent tariff on foreign films in the US? We spoke to the industry experts to understand the US President's decision, and the respective action to be taken.

Pakistan sweats, India's dam closure could hit its food bowlIndia has flushed and shut two dams on the Chenab to refill them within weeks of suspending the Indus Waters Treaty. The Chenab of the Indus Water System is Pakistan's lifeline. Pakistani authorities saw a dip in water levels in Chenab, coinciding with the crucial kharif season when food crops like paddy and maize are sown.

Cash-strapped Pak to hike defence spending by 18% amid tensions with India: ReportAmid rising tensions with India over the April 22 Pahalgam terror attack, cash-strapped Pakistan has endorsed an 18 per cent hike in defence spending to over Rs 2.5 trillion in the 2025-26 budget.

Live: Qatar Emir speaks to PM, extends support to India's fight against terrorismPahalgam terror attack live updates: Amid rising India-Pakistan tensions in the wake of the Pahalgam terror attack in which 26 people were killed by terrorists, the United Nations Security Council has held closed-door consultations where envoys called for restraint and dialogue. Meanwhile, a parliamentary panel has sought details from two key ministries overseeing information flow on the action they have planned against social media platforms and influencers who "seem to be working against national interest", following the Pahalgam terror attack. Follow indiatoday.in for more updates.
Kamala Harris makes Met Gala debut in classic Off-White gownKamala Harris stepped onto the Met Gala red carpet for the first time in a sleek black-and-cream off-white gown.

What are Turkish warship, military planes doing in Pak amid war fears?As a panicked Pakistan waits for an Indian military response to the Pahalgam terror attack, it looks to be getting military help from its "brother" Turkey. In one week, a Turkish Air Force C-130 aircraft and a warship reached Pakistan. While both Turkey and Pakistan have denied claims of military hardware delivery, the timing and nature of these visits suggest they may carry more strategic weight than acknowledged.

Pakistan thought they had an advantage: Shashi Tharoor on UN talksIndia and Pakistan's strained relations escalate post Pahalgam terror attack. Diplomatic tensions mount as Pakistan fails to garner support at the UN.

India's civil defence drills and the many messages India wants to sendThe sheer breadth of the exercise — covering 244 districts and involving civilian participation in blackouts, air raid sirens, evacuation drills, and camouflaging vital infrastructure — marks a departure from the limited, targeted responses of the past.

How Maria Montessori's 7 years in India during WWII shaped modern preschoolingWhen Italian doctor Maria Montessori got detained in India during World War II, she turned her unexpected stay into an opportunity. She trained teachers, established schools and developed 'Cosmic Education', an innovative method to teach children that continues to influence India's learning landscape today as the famed Montessori model.

Mega security drill at 259 sites tomorrow, including Delhi, Mumbai and ChennaiAmid rising India-Pakistan tensions after the April 22 Pahalgam terror attack, the Centre has announced a nationwide civil defence drill on May 7 across 259 locations. The mock drill will include air raid sirens, blackout protocols, and public training, with officials urging citizens to keep torches, candles, and cash ready.

Conclave to elect new Pope tomorrow, cardinals to move into Vatican todayFollowing the death of Pope Francis on April 21, 133 cardinal electors will gather on Wednesday in the Sistine Chapel for an election that could last hours, days, or even months.

If not us, there will be no one: Pak minister's warning amid tensions with IndiaThe remark comes as tensions between the two countries hit a new low following the Pahalgam terror attack, after which India took several actions against the neighbouring country, including the suspension of the Indus Waters Treaty.

sports.headline: Nation first: IPL chief Arun Dhumal on cricket amid rising India-Pakistan tensionIPL chairman Arun Dhumal reaffirmed that Indian cricket will follow the government's lead on ties with Pakistan, emphasising "nation first" amid rising tensions in the aftermath of the Pahalgam attack. He also confirmed plans to expand the IPL to a 94-match season by 2028 while celebrating the emergence of new Indian talent in 2025.

India shouldn't play Pakistan in cricket till terrorism ends: Gautam GambhirAfter the Pahalgam terror attack, India coach Gautam Gambhir says there should be no cricket with Pakistan until peace is restored and justice is done, even if it means skipping ICC matches.

Kagiso Rabada return delayed: GT skipper Shubman Gill explains call for MI clashGT have decided not to rush Kagiso Rabada as the South African pacer was made to sit out the clash against MI at the Wankhede stadium on Tuesday, May 6. Rabada recently returned to GT squad after serving his suspension for a failed drug test.

KKR know how to shut out noise around MS Dhoni craze: Chandrakant PanditKKR head coach Chandrakant Pandit feels that his side is capable of shutting out the noise around MS Dhoni's return to Kolkata as they face CSK at the Eden Gardens on May 7. Dhoni will be returning to the iconic ground as the captain of CSK.

Inter vs Barcelona, Champions League semi-final 2nd Leg: All you need to knowAfter a pulsating 3-3 first leg in Spain, Inter Milan and Barcelona return for a decisive battle at the San Siro, each desperate to reclaim European glory and secure a coveted spot in the final.

Too early to say if India vs Pakistan will happen in ICC events: Sunil GavaskarSunil Gavaskar, speaking to India Today, said it is too early to predict if India and Pakistan will face off in ICC tournaments amid rising tensions following the Pahalgam terror attack. He added that the IPL remains unaffected and assured that foreign players and commentators feel safe in India.

KL Rahul has gone off the boil: Aakash Chopra comments on DC's batting slumpAakash Chopra criticised the DC batting order's form and said that KL Rahul has gone completely off the boil in recent games. Rahul has struggled to get into form in the past few games for DC.

IPL 2025: Rohit Sharma 79 runs away from joining Virat Kohli in elite listIndia and Mumbai Indians' (MI) batter Rohit Sharma is 79 runs away from joining Virat Kohli in an elite list and becoming the second player in IPL to complete 7000 runs. Rohit has found form after a poor start to IPL 2025.

AIPA writes letter to PM Modi seeking recognition from Sports MinistryThe All India Pickleball Association has reached out to PM Narendra Modi, seeking intervention after the Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports granted recognition to a newly formed pickleball body.

Kashvee Gautam ruled out of tri series due to injury, to be replaced by Kranti GoudIndia women's all-rounder Kashvee Gautam has been ruled out of the ongoing tri series due to an injury. Gautam made her debut during the first match of the series and has remained wicketless after three matches.

Too early to say if India vs Pakistan will happen in ICC events: Sunil GavaskarSunil Gavaskar, speaking to India Today, said it is too early to predict if India and Pakistan will face off in ICC tournaments amid rising tensions following the Pahalgam terror attack. He added that the IPL remains unaffected and assured that foreign players and commentators feel safe in India.

Kashvee Gautam ruled out of tri series due to injury, to be replaced by Kranti GoudIndia women's all-rounder Kashvee Gautam has been ruled out of the ongoing tri series due to an injury. Gautam made her debut during the first match of the series and has remained wicketless after three matches.

He stunned me: Virat Kohli reveals ex-RCB star's massive impact on his young careerIPL 2025: Speaking to Mayanti Langer on an RCB podcast, Virat Kohli recalled how Mark Boucher's guidance helped him understand his potential and the work he needed to put in to make a seamless transition to international cricket.

French minister apologises to Liverpool fans over 2022 Champions League chaosFrance's Justice Minister Gérald Darmanin has issued an apology to Liverpool fans for wrongly blaming them for the chaotic scenes before the 2022 Champions League final at the Stade de France.

Virat Kohli breaks silence on quitting as India, RCB captain: Needed to be happyVirat Kohli revealed that the relentless pressure of leadership eventually pushed him to step down as captain of both the Indian team and Royal Challengers Bangalore. He also admitted that, during that challenging period, he briefly considered leaving RCB.

Virat Kohli recalls 2019 World Cup heartbreak: It was a horrible hangoverStar India batter Virat Kohli recalled India's heartbreaking loss in the 2019 World Cup semi-final against New Zealand and compared it to a 'horrible hangover'. India lost to New Zealand by 18 runs and got knocked out of the tournament.

Barcelona's Hansi Flick praises Lamine Yamal's impact ahead of Inter clashBarcelona manager Hansi Flick has praised 17-year-old Lamine Yamal ahead of their UEFA Champions League semifinal second leg against Inter Milan in Italy.

AB de Villiers slams Kohli's strike rate critics, gives new nickname to batterFormer South Africa cricketer AB de Villiers has slammed star India batter Virat Kohli's critics amid his prolific run in the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

Shubman Gill is a very competitive captain: Sai Sudharsan praises GT skipperGujarat Titans opener Sai Sudharsan praised skipper Shubman Gill as a competitive captain while highlighting the strong chemistry behind their successful opening partnership.

Will Gujarat be able to stop Mumbai's winning juggernaut and claim top spot?Mumbai Indians (MI) are set to take on Gujarat Titans (GT) in Match 56 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) at Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai. MI are on a six-match winning streak while Gujarat are also in fine form with both their batting and bowling firing.

MI are on a six-match winning streak while Gujarat are also in fine form with both their batting and bowling firing.

Liverpool fans burn Alexander-Arnold's jersey after defender announces departureLiverpool fans burned Trent Alexander-Arnold's jersey in protest after the English defender announced his decision to leave the club at the end of the 2024–25 season.

Virat Kohli always said I will be next Sachin Tendulkar, reveals school teacherStar India batter Virat Kohli's school teacher has recently revealed that he had the desire to be the next Sachin Tendulkar right from his childhood and worked hard to excel both in cricket and academics.

Shubman Gill not affected by weight of captaincy: GT director Vikram SolankiIPL 2025, MI vs GT: Gujarat Titans' Director of Cricket, Vikram Solanki, said Shubman Gill has thrived in his role as captain of the former champions this season. He also shed light on the secret behind the successful opening partnership between Gill and Sai Sudharsan.

Shai Hope to lead West Indies squad for ODI series against Ireland and EnglandShai Hope will lead West Indies's 15-member squad for six 50-over contests in Europe against Ireland and England, scheduled for later this month.

IPL 2025: Conditions in Hyderabad weren't what we expected, says SRH coachSunrisers Hyderabad head coach Daniel Vettori said that the conditions in Hyderabad didn't match their expectations and proved tricky for batters. SRH's washout against Delhi Capitals knocked them out of contention for the IPL 2025 playoffs.

Put Jasprit Bumrah off his mark: Shane Watson's ultimate challenge for GT Shane Watson revealed that the ultimate challenge for the GT batters will be to put Jasprit Bumrah off his mark during their match at the Wankhede stadium on May 6. Bumrah has been in top form with the ball after his return from injury.

Need 3 more wins, every point is crucial at this stage: DC's Ashutosh SharmaDelhi Capitals' Ashutosh Sharma said that their goal is to win the remaining three matches of the season after the washed-out fixture against Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH). Delhi are ranked fifth on the points table with six wins from 11 matches.

Coach Daniel Vettori blames lack of consistency for SRH's early eliminationSunrisers Hyderabad head coach Daniel Vettori lamented his team's inconsistency throughout the season after their hopes of reaching the IPL 2025 playoffs were dashed on Monday.

IPL 2025: Ashutosh Sharma delighted with being Delhi Capitals' rescue manDelhi Capitals' batter Ashutosh Sharma has said that he is happy to be his team's rescue man in the ongoing Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025)  as he loves to perform under pressure.

DC needs to get their act together or else face the familiar IPL blackhole againDelhi Capitals appear to be facing a familiar situation that has plagued them in the past as their once promising IPL 2025 campaign seems to be hitting a roadblock. Can the Capitals save their campaign before it is too late?

Nearly fell off chair seeing Karun Nair open: Shane Watson slams DC tacticsShane Watson slammed Delhi Capitals for disrupting their batting order, calling out the management's unnecessary changes after Karun Nair's promotion backfired in their crucial IPL 2025 clash against Sunrisers Hyderabad.

IPL playoffs race explained: RCB in pole position as 7 teams in top 4 battleIPL 2025: Seven teams are in the race for four spots in the playoffs. While former champions CSK, SRH and RR are out of the race, RCB are in pole position as they look to finish in the top two for the first time since 2016.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".
